Index.meta_description: Discover L'Essence K, artisan joiner and cabinetmaker creating custom walk-in closets, bathrooms and unique furniture.
Index.hero_slide3_tagline: Bathrooms, walk-in closets and sloped spaces
Index.hero_slide4_tagline: Jackets, helmets, auto/moto and much more
Index.gallery_preview_description: Discover a selection of our most beautiful realisations. Each piece is unique, designed to meet the most demanding expectations of our clients.

Services.page_description: Discover the extent of our know-how, from traditional joinery to the most modern and personalized creations.

dressing.title: Walk-in Closet
dressing.description: Our walk-in closets are designed to be ergonomic and aesthetic, a true showcase for your clothes and shoes, they are thought out to optimize every available square centimeter. Straight or sloped, our closets are equipped with wardrobes, adjustable shelves, full-extension drawers, shoe racks and lighting.

salledebain.title: Bathroom
salledebain.description: The "bathroom" space is a masterpiece of your home, our furniture is designed to be robust and functional. All our furniture is custom-made and with moisture-resistant materials and modern coatings.

placard.title: Closets
placard.description: Our custom closets are designed to provide maximum storage while optimizing all available space, between walls and from floor to ceiling.

mansarde.title: Sloped Spaces
mansarde.description: Specialist in sloped spaces, L'Essence K makes it a point of honor to optimize and occupy every available space for your slopes and under-stairs.

mobilier.title: Unique & Traditional Furniture
mobilier.description: L'Essence K is above all about creation, and in our workshop, everything is possible. In solid wood, metal or composite, the only limit set will be that of our imagination.

kustom.title: Kustom & Personalization
kustom.description: The Kustom branch of the L'Essence K workshop is the little extra of our activity. Fan of Kustom Culture and US, we also offer customization of leather jackets and gloves, motorcycle helmets, decorative objects and finally auto and moto relooking.

History.biography_text: Jo Cappitta is the face and hands of the L'Essence K workshop. Former student of the Compagnons du Devoir du Tour de France, his strong experience in furniture creation and in the history of design and art will allow you to have a major ally in the layout of all your spaces. Carpenter, artist, cabinetmaker and photographer, Jo Cappitta will put all his knowledge and ideas at your service.
History.quote: The only limit set will be that of our imagination.
